titleStmt.title: The English nonconformity as under King Charles II and King James II truly stated and argued by Richard Baxter ; who earnestly beseecheth rulers and clergy not to divide and destroy the land and cast their own souls on the dreadful guilt and punishment of national perjury ...
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Harvard University Libraries.
